sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card class="pb-8">
    <v-card-actions class="d-flex justify-end">
      <v-btn icon @click="closeDialog">
        <v-icon>mdi-close</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </v-card-actions>
    <v-card-title class="d-flex justify-center">
      {{ formatDateToJa(clickedDate) }}
    </v-card-title>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item v-for="event in dayEvents" :key="event.id">
          <v-list-item-content class="pa-0">
            <v-btn
              depressed
              :color="event.color"
              class="white--text justify-start"
              @click="$event => showEvent(event)"
            >
              {{ event.startDate }}{{ event.timed ? ' ' + event.startTime : ''}} ~
              {{ event.endDate }} 
              {{ event.timed ? event.endTime : ' 終日' }}
              {{ event.name }}
            </v-btn>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { format } from 'date-fns';
import { mapGetters, mapActions } from 'vuex';
import { formatDateToJa } from '../../functions/datetime';
import EventFormDialog from '../events/EventFormDialog';

export default {
  name: 'DayEventList',
  components: {
    EventFormDialog
  },
  data: () => ({
    value: format(new Date(), 'yyyy/MM/dd'),
    drawer: false,
    group: null,
    dialog: null
  }),
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('events', ['dayEvents', 'clickedDate'])
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('events', ['setClickedDate', 'setEvent', 'setEditMode']),
    formatDateToJa,
    showEvent({ nativeEvent, event }) {
      this.setEvent(event);
      this.setEditMode(false);
      this.closeDialog();
      nativeEvent.stopPropagation();
    },
    closeDialog() {
      this.setClickedDate(null);
      // this.setCalendar(null);
    }
  }
};
</script>
